intervention_catalogue.name: Finance, benefit and debt services
intervention_catalogue.short_description: Finance, benefit and debt services help men on probation manage their money effectively, reducing financial stress that could lead to reoffending.
intervention_catalogue.long_description: Finance, benefit and debt services help men on probation manage their money effectively, reducing financial stress that could lead to reoffending.
intervention_catalogue.session_detail: The type, number and length of sessions can vary, depending on the location and service provider.
